abilities.name: Rampart
abilities.rule: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model has a 2+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Icon of Obstinacy
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than or equal to the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Inspiring Commander
abilities.rule: If you include this model in your army, until the end of the battle, non-**CHARACTER** models in **TERMINATOR ASSAULT SQUAD** and **TERMINATOR SQUAD** units from your army have an Objective Control characteristic of 2 while they are not Battle-shocked.

unit_composition:

**This model is equipped with:** Fist of Dorn.
